title: No train service between Choa Chu Kang and Bukit Panjang

title_translations.zh-Hans: Choa Chu Kang 和 Bukit Panjang 之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara Choa Chu Kang dan Bukit Panjang
title_translations.ta: Choa Chu Kang மற்றும் Bukit Panjang இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Free regular bus & free bridging bus services have ceased.

[BPLRT] CLEARED: Train service between #ChoaChuKang and
#BukitPanjang are now running normally.

[BPLRT] No train service between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang in
both directions due to a power fault.
